name: Peace Out Acne Jumbo Holiday Value Pack
about: What it is:A limited-edition pouch of 40 bestselling blemish patches combining clean hydrocolloid polymer technology and actives to visibly zap breakouts overnight..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Redness and Acne and Blemishes.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- Encapsulated Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target acne blemishes and blackheads..Ingredient Callouts:This product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Dont let breakouts ruin your festivitiesu2014address them on the go with 40 bestselling acne patches in this limited-edition pouch. Clean hydrocolloid polymer technology and acne-targeting ingredients, like encapsulated salicylic acid, visibly minimize breakouts in six hours or less..Clinical Results:In a consumer study:.Clean at SephoraOur commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Encapsulated Salicylic Acid: Penetrates pores to target acne blemishes and blackheads..-Retinol Acetate (Vitamin A): Promotes clear-looking skin..-Aloe Vera Leaf Extract: Gently soothes while minimizing redness...Salicylic Acid 0.5%, Cellulose Gum, Glyceryl Hydrogenated Rosinate, Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Retinyl Acetate...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing, apply a dot (tacky-side down) directly on your blemish..-For best results, wear for at least six hours..-For even peskier breakouts, use with Peace Out Acne Serum (sold separately)..-If you're experiencing any areas of excessive dryness, open skin, or went a little heavy handed with peels/chemical exfoliation/actives, give your skin a little resting time before using these patches...Precautions:.-Avoid direct contact with eyes..-For external use only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These dont draw out the contents of my pimples but they do flatten them overnight. However it leaves red marks. Overpriced for the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love these and this is a great deal for something that just works

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These were worth it on sale but wouldnt be worth it full price. I dont find them to be really any better than other ones on the market but theyre better than AliExpress ones. Not see through and better for night wear
